name: Race Proto
description:
Hey! This is a small prototype arcade racing project. My aim was to experiment with the game feel and level design. 

This slice was inspired by games like NFS, Asphalt, Blur, Split Second, etc.

There isn't any gameplay here just free roam one way. If you are a racing game fan hopefully you will enjoy this tiny piece.

This prototype is fully composed of free-to-use assets from the web!

Feel free to let me know how your feel about this!
